Password reset link is sent to your registered email address. Please check and click on the link to reset your password.
Hello blank fragment
You don\'t have enough Play Coins. Kindly purchase some Play Coins inorder to join this match.
You have enough Play Coins to join this match.
\u25CF Make sure you have set your PubG Username(IGN) and not Character ID.
\u25CF Above PubG Username should match the username in Edit Profile Section.
\u25CF You can update your Pubg Username in Edit Profile Section
\u25CF No new PubG Account is allowed. PubG Accounts with Level > 40 are allowed.
By participating, you accept the Fair Play Policy.
You have successfully joined the match. Room ID and Password will be shared to you 15 minutes before the match start time.
\u25CF No new PUBG accounts are allowed. PUBG accounts with level less than 40 are not allowed to participate. Such participants will be kicked out from the room and they will not be given refund.
\u25CF If in anyway, you fail to join the room by the match start time then we are not responsible for it. In such cases, Refund will not be processed. So make sur to join on time.
\u25CF Do not share the Room ID & Password with anyone who has not joined the match. If you are found doing so, your account may get terminated and all the winnings will be lost.
\u25CF Griefing & Teaming is against the game rules. Any participants found doing so, will be disqualified and their orizes will be lost.
\u25CF Room ID & Password will be shared in the app before 15 minutes of Match Start Time.
\u25CF Match will start after 15 minutes of sharing Room ID & Password
\u25CF Make sure to grab Room ID & Password before the Match Start Time
\u25CF Make sure you join the Match Room ASAP, before the match starts.
\u25CF This match is a Paid Match. To participate, you have to pay the entry fee. There are total 100 spots available. Join it before all the spots are filled.
\u25CF Please note that the listed entry fee is per individual and not the squad/duo team
\u25CF Each member of a team (Squad or Duo) has to pay the entry fee and register individually for the match or tournament.
\u25CF Once you join the match custom room, do not keep changing your position. If you do so, you may get kicked out from the Room.
\u25CF Spots are given on the basis of First Come First Get.
\u25CF Last standing man gets the Chicken Dinner Award.
\u25CF You will be also rewarded for each kill. Check the rewards details above.
\u25CF Use only Mobile Devices to join Match. Do not use any Hacks or Emulators.
\u25CF If anyone found violating these rules then immediate action will be taken and respective accounts may get banned and rewards may be abandoned.
\u25CF If you have any queries then contact us on contact@shubham.com
\u25CF Also, if you want to arrange Giveaway or Sponser any such match then drop us a mail at contact@shubham.com

Join a match and you get rewarded

Addicted to PUBG! Want to make some csh out of it? Try out PlayAdda247, an eSports Platform. Join daily PUBG matches & get rewards on each kill you score. Get huge prize on getting chicken dinner. Just download the PlayAdda247 android app & register using the Referral code given below to get Rs 5 free sign up bonus.
